website_summaries.verdict: These compression leggings fit comfortably and allow you a full range of motion without tearing or stretching out.
pros: Moisture-wicking fabric helps keep you cool
Won't slide down on you during your workouts
cons: They tend to run small, so you may want to order a size up

customer_reviews.title: Best ever.
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love the moment i put them on, exactly what i was wanting to get. They are see through enough if you were to wear a light color under them you would be able to see slightly. I was comfortable enough in them to go to the store with a black and white thong on and didnt feel to exposed but was still quite thrilling. So if your looking to show off a bit there a great pair for that. Im 5'11" 180lbs and bought a medium and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Appol

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: thes are the first pair of compression leggings I have tried and so far I am comfortable with the fit and design. I put them in the dryer once by accident and there weree no ill effects from them. I think they are a good product at a good price. I liked them enough that I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parry

customer_reviews.title: extremely good values for entry level compression pants
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for entry level compression pants. Definitely not very thick or as high quality as well known 'named brand' sport clothing manufacturers, but 1/5 to 1/8 of the cost. Good to have some inexpensive ones as option along with a few high quality and high priced ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: d808Top Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: A little long for me
customer_reviews.text: I like this compression pants. Fit nicely but a little long for me. Wish its a little short where leg opening sit between my Calf and Ankle.
customer_reviews.author: EricC

customer_reviews.title: Cooool
customer_reviews.text: Good compression pants. I run, wear under my speed suit and they work
customer_reviews.author: Daslickest

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, keeps warm/cool depending on environment temperature. Light weight, good for use as underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Decent compression pants
customer_reviews.text: Good compression pants, and definitely a good price. The only thing about these pants is that they won't last you very long if your very active. Still, a good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: Raul Tobar

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Not bad...kinda thin...but for the price, that was expected... I'm 150# and 5'8"and bought a medium...not that tight but too long...I would go with a small next time...
customer_reviews.author: Jet Tool

customer_reviews.title: Support when I'm running.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. I don't know if it's the placebo effect, but I feel like I run longer and harder with compression pants. And they held up better then I thought after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dana a Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to keep you warm during cold weather. Lightweight but perfect
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Wick moisture, but not good for insulation.
customer_reviews.text: These fit very tightly. I planned to use as a base layer under my pants, but they wick so well that it made my legs cold. These work better in warm weather to keep cool, not as insulation.
customer_reviews.author: bricker13

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the results of wearing these
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the results of wearing these. They helped ease the symptoms of poor circulation. Ordered a second pair. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good compression baselayes to workout,fit realy nice,I'll recomended to a friend
customer_reviews.author: The Joker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend sizing up. As a very skinny guy who usually wears Smalls in everything, the Medium is just right for me
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe these are not pants
customer_reviews.text: The seams are pretty prominent, they make visible lines that don't show as strongy in the pics as they do in person. You might not want to wear them in public without something else covering your butt. They're comfortable though and I think they look good
customer_reviews.author: David St John

customer_reviews.title: Great compression leggings
customer_reviews.text: Great compression leggings. I'm 6' and 205 pounds. I bought mediums and they fit great, nice and snug. They help keep my legs warm and ready for leg day.
customer_reviews.author: Remington8

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of like kids pajamas. Not at all a good compression product. If anything, counter productive.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Y.

customer_reviews.title: Compression Perfection
customer_reviews.text: These fit & feel great. I wear them under shorts whilst training my lower body (e.g. leg press).
customer_reviews.author: Dbisn6x0

customer_reviews.title: They fit + affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fit me perfectly, when I first pulled them out I thought they'd be too small but they were kinda shribbled up from being in a package I suppose? Either way I put them on and they fit perfectly. Will buy other colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Material to thin
customer_reviews.text: The material was too thin. People can see your underwear through this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fits well
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality spandex for the price; they fit well and have a great amount of elasticity. I looked all over in stores for a product like these and they all cost about $30-$50, so to get two pair for $30 was a great deal. I'm 6'2", 150lbs and a medium fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tesla makes great compression gear.
customer_reviews.text: Tesla makes the best compression gear. Super affordable but very good quality. I've bought a ton of their products
customer_reviews.author: William Mainaga

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of these but unfortunately they are poorly made. The stitching has shredded on both pairs I purchased. They have only been worn a handful of times during the few months I’ve had them. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sahm

customer_reviews.title: My son needed something to take the edge off while ...
customer_reviews.text: My son needed something to take the edge off while running in the cold weather. He likes it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dilciapaul1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They fit perfectly and they are also stylish .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For this price it the best compression pants! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, keeps me warm and makes me look badass!
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Michelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel great and really feel it cooling as I work out.
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know. I ordered the pants and received a tank top.
customer_reviews.author: Jim James

customer_reviews.title: ... the same compression tights and ended up getting one great one and another one of a lower quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the same compression tights and ended up getting one great one and another one of a lower quality. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Reemon Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used em on a 15hr flight. My legs felt great.
customer_reviews.author: GQish

customer_reviews.title: I wish Tesla cars were this affordable
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice. I feel as like I’m wearing silk. Looks slick
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reviews Amazon

customer_reviews.title: awesome would recomend to all
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fit wicks away sweat so it keeps you cool but enough coverage to keep your legs warm in the cool nights
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Ouellette Jr.

product_meta.title: Tesla CLSL TM-MUP19-KLB_Medium Men's Compression Pants Baselayer Cool Dry Sports Tights Leggings MUP19
